articles.title: OpenAI discloses API customer data breach via Mixpanel vendor hack
articles.summary: OpenAI is notifying some ChatGPT API customers that limited identifying information was exposed following a breach at its third-party analytics provider Mixpanel. [...]

articles.title: New ShadowV2 botnet malware used AWS outage as a test opportunity
articles.summary: A new Mirai-based botnet malware named 'ShadowV2' has been observed targeting IoT devices from D-Link, TP-Link, and other vendors with exploits for known vulnerabilities. [...]

articles.title: Popular Forge library gets fix for signature verification bypass flaw
articles.summary: A vulnerability in the 'node-forge' package, a popular JavaScript cryptography library, could be exploited to bypass signature verifications by crafting data that appears valid. [...]

articles.title: Comcast to pay $1.5M fine for vendor breach affecting 270K customers
articles.summary: Comcast will pay a $1.5 million fine to settle a Federal Communications Commission investigation into a February 2024 vendor data breach that exposed the personal information of nearly 275,000 customers. [...]

articles.title: Multiple London councils' IT systems disrupted by cyberattack
articles.summary: The Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea (RBKC) and the Westminster City Council (WCC) announced that they are experiencing service disruptions following a cybersecurity issue. [...]

articles.title: Microsoft: Security keys may prompt for PIN after recent updates
articles.summary: Microsoft warned users on Tuesday that FIDO2 security keys may prompt them to enter a PIN when signing in after installing Windows updates released since the September 2025 preview update. [...]

articles.title: Microsoft to secure Entra ID sign-ins from script injection attacks
articles.summary: Starting in mid-to-late October 2026, Microsoft will enhance the security of the Entra ID authentication system against external script injection attacks. [...]

articles.title: ASUS warns of new critical auth bypass flaw in AiCloud routers
articles.summary: ASUS has released new firmware to patch nine security vulnerabilities, including a critical authentication bypass flaw in routers with AiCloud enabled. [...]

articles.summary: Passwork 7 unifies enterprise password and secrets management in a self-hosted platform. Organizations can automate credential workflows and test the full system with a free trial and up to 50% Black Friday savings. [...]

articles.title: OnSolve CodeRED cyberattack disrupts emergency alert systems nationwide
articles.summary: Risk management company Crisis24 has confirmed its OnSolve CodeRED platform suffered a cyberattack that disrupted emergency notification systems used by state and local governments, police departments, and fire agencies across the United States. [...]
